legacy.full_text:
Measuring only 4.53" wide and 11.3" tall, the G22 can fit in the most compact spaces. 
   
Even with an ultra-compact chassis measuring only 10L in volume, the G22 delivers unparalleled performance. Take your gaming to the next level with a 13th Gen Intel® Core™ i7 Processor.

result.text:
Themed "Creating a Resilient and Sustainable Future for All," #APEC2023 addresses the impacts of climate change as a core focus of its work.  

In recent years, Chile has accelerated its energy transition through broad-based political support, private-public partnerships and innovative green technologies. Chile has set an ambitious goal of converting 70 percent of its total energy consumption into renewables by 2030 and pledged to become carbon neutral by 2050.
